titleStmt.title: A ballad on the gyants in the physick garden in Oxford, who have been breeding feet as long as garagantua was teeth. To the tune of, The counter scuffle
titleStmt.author: Gayton, Edmund, 1608-1666.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edmund Gayton. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
